title: Duplicate emails on zoho server
content:
Hi there,

This used to be a bug last year & then it was fixed & now it's back. Bugzilla said to contact you guys.

I am still on 102, & I don't want to switch to 115 yet.

Here's the bug which caused me a lot of stress last week...

I've been getting tons of duplicate emails coming into multiple account's inbox all day for several days & zoho is blocking me because of it since it's pinging their server.

I am using Zoho & they are all aliases. I pay for 2 emails & they both have different aliases.

Each account has a filter to filter out the emails from the other addys & only give me the ones for that addy's account.

It's also duplicating them sometimes 15 times AND they go back 2 weeks each time, so not new emails, but 2 week old emails.

It even happens with emails I deleted & filed in my folders.

Help.

Thanks

Expected results:

Just one email in each account.
creator: news8

title: Helper Applcation Missing
content:
Hello There all So I recently installed Win11 and Tbird 115.7.0

My issue is this: When I double click a PDF in a received email it opens up in my default PDF reader (Foxit) so it's all good. When I'm composing an email and add a PDF I like to check to see that I'm sending the correct PDF attachment so I double click and it won't open, I get this message (Attached Image) I went to Tools/Settings/General/Files&Attachments and PDF (Foxit) is set as the default so all good

So again Inbox messages opens PDF's no problem Composing messages won't open PDF's

I used to do this all the time on Win10 and it worked perfectly See my settings in image 2 Thanks In Advance :-)
creator: shop60

title: Default newest on top (including within group sort)
content:
Want to:

  • Sort email by newest on top
  • Include sub-emails within threads for the newest on top (currently still oldest on top)
  • Apply this default setting to all. I don't want to sort every account, every folder manually. That's too tedious.

Thunderbird has oldest on top. This includes emails within a thread/conversation. Changing the sort to newest on top does not change the emails within the thread/conversation. The sort does not apply to all emails. I find this very annoying.
creator: makatogonzo

title: OAuth stopped working on one gmail account. At a loss, nothing appears to fix it.
content:
As of December 1st 2023, one of my gmail accounts in thunderbird stopped working. Every time I check messages, I get the Oauth prompts to allow thunderbird access to the gmail account, I click through without error messages, and I can see the rights were granted to Thunderbird in my account, but Thunderbird is unable to connect. If I check saved passwords, I see it has not saved an OAuth password.

Things I have done: (1) Verified everything in this article: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20 (2) Verified that IMAP was enabled on the gmail account (3) Checked the settings against my other gmail accounts which are all working, I don't see any difference. (And this account was working up until December 1st, along with all my other ones which are still working)

Anyone have any ideas what might be causing this?
creator: st.jfisher

title: 115.7.0 Layout - How do I switch back to pre 115 layout?
content:
My Thunderbird updated and how it displays the Email accounts, Emails, and Content of the emails presented to the user as vertical columns as opposed to the previous versions is making it virtually unusable. If I had 3 monitors to spread the application across it might be usable to read the emails but as it sits right now, the email preview pane is like a reading a cash register receipt.

How can I change the "theme" back to the horizontal display of messages and emails with accounts on the left as it was before this update?

on a personal note, I never understood why software companies feel the desire to force interface changes on their userbase. Why mess with perfection?
creator: 1hawaiiguy

title: SEND LATER
content: I am using SEND LATER feature in Thunderbird to email a newsletter to my customers. My customer list is about 2500 emails long. I currently use SEND LATER to send emails in packs of 30 at a time per hour - but this is done manually and is very tedious and time consuming. My question: is there a way I can enter the whole mailing list of about 2500 email addresses and have Thunderbird divvy it up to send say 30 emails per hour automatically as it goes down the email list?
creator: jd1965

title: Thunderbird ana parola hatası
content: İyi günler, Thunderbird mail programında,ana parolayı girin kısmında eğer 3 kez vazgeçe basarsam,mail programı şifresiz olarak açılıyor. Kullandığım versiyon Thunderbird 115.7.0 (x64). İyi günler dilerim.
creator: xkarekup

title: Non ricevo più mail sui miei profili di porta elettronica
content: Buongiorno, ho riscontrato dei problemi con la ricezione delle mail sui miei profili thunderbird. Il problema si è presentato dopo una notifica di inserimento password per la mia pec (camperandtour@pec.it). Nonostante l'inserimento della password, essa risulta sbagliata e non riesco a modificarla, poichè non appare neanche nelle password salvate di thunderbird. Nello stesso tempo, anche sul mio altro account (info@camperandtour.it) non riesco più a ricevere mail, ma facendo l'accesso da un altro dispositivo esse arrivano senza problemi. Come posso fare per risolvere la situazione?
creator: info10779

title: Řazení zpráv podle data doručení pro Mack Thunderbird
content: Lze nastavit řazení zpráv vzestupně/sestupně podle data doručení pro celou schránku nebo alespoň v případě strukturovaných složek schránky pro nejvyšší složku tak aby se to aplikovalo i pro podložky? Zatím jsem našel řazení jen samostatně pro jednotlivé složky.
creator: roman46

title: There is no default mail. win 10/64b, Thunderbird 115/32b, I tried everything!
content:
Dear community, I get the error "There is no default mail client or the current mail client...". <send to> and adding files to a new message by programs like pdf printer stopped working. It worked before. Suddenly stopped.

what I did with no results: In 'Default apps' - Thunderbird ofc. 'Email' needs to be set as 'Thunderbird' reinstallation of TB 64b. installation TB 32b. HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Clients\Mail​, -> Mozilla Thunderbird HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Clients\Mail -> Mozilla Thunderbird HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Clients\Mailto -> Mozilla Thunderbird HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\mailto\shell\open\command -> "C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Thunderbird\thunderbird.exe" -osint -compose "%1"

I will add that if I set the default Outlook, it works (Now I have deleted it).

What should I do to make Thunderbird work?
creator: tre33

title: Message send errors and unresponsiveness after wake from sleep
content:
When I wake my computer every morning, TB is semi-responsive and there are dozens of message send errors (image 2a) sometimes with "commonDialog" file save prompts (2b). TB still lets me navigate some menus but can't send or receive mail. I have to quit and relaunch to resume normal function. There are often a series of files saved to disk with names like "tx7yDgnw.xhtml.part".

I haven't found any suggestions for fixing this on either TB or Beonex forums and am not sure how to figure out what's causing the problem. I thought somebody here might have a suggestion?

---System info--- iMac M1 running Mac OS 14.3 TB 115.7.0 (but have had this issue for through many previous versions) TB Plugins: Owl For Exchange (Beonex)

thanks
creator: seth_goldman

title: Problem with New TBird Version Not Displaying All Messages in Gmail Folders
content: Ever since I installed the new version of Thunderbird, it has not been displaying many new Gmail messages in the subfolders to which I have assigned them. Although recent messages in my Gmail subfolders display properly on the Gmail web interface, and although all messages display properly in the "All Mail" folder in Thunderbird, many new messages are not being displayed in their subfolders on Thunderbird. This weird new behavior is not consistent; when I copy some messages from "All Mail" to a subfolder, they display properly in that subfolder, whereas others stubbornly refuse to display. If there is some trick to getting them to display properly, or if I need to revert to a previous version of Thunderbird, please let me know how to go about it.
creator: kathleenseidel55

title: Google accounts won't authenticate
content:
After a few years of not using Thunderbird, someone at FOSDEM convinced me to give it another go but now I'm running into trouble adding some of my accounts. I have 5 different gmail addresses, two gmail and three on my own domains that are hosted by gmail. I managed to add the two gmail addresses without a problem but the three email addresses that are on my domains won't authenticate. When I added the gmail addresses a window popped up asking me to allow Thunderbird but with my domain addresses it does not. I guess it has to be a setting in google admin for my domains but I have no idea what it is called, what to look for or where to find it.

If anyone can give me some guidance it would be highly appreciated.

Many thanks.
creator: jannetta

title: All read mail is hidden or missing
content: I opened Thunderbird and only new messages since I last closed it are visible. All read messages in all folders are either hidden are gone. I can't tell which. This is not just in the inbox, but all subfolders. I tried choosing "repair folder" from the properties of the folder, and no effect. In View>Threads, the setting is "all". I have no idea what to try next. Thanks.
creator: eric229

title: Thunderbird custom themes
content:
I'm trying to change the colors on Thunderbird, and I want it to match my Firefox colors. I have customized my colors on Firefox with the Firefox Color website(?) and I'm wondering if there is a way to apply that customization to Thunderbird.

I have tried exporting my custom theme from Firefox Color (both formats) and then manually installing it to Thunderbird, but it tells me the files appear to be corrupted when I try installing.

If anyone knows a way to customize the Thunderbird colors myself, rather than having to rely on pre-built themes, please let me know. I like to change the colors to match my desktop picture, so it changes somewhat often.
creator: songirl.yn

title: Can't edit/delete imported TB calendar events
content:
After moving from Win 10 to Win 11, I exported my TB calendar events on the Win 10 PC, and imported them on the Win 11 PC. Now I can't edit or delete the imported events. The "edit" and "delete" tasks are greyed out.

All help's appreciated
creator: drister
